attributes.action: Nursing staff who are working Christmas Day
attributes.additional_details: We have worked tirelessly throughout the pandemic and are unable to celebrate like the rest of Tier 3
attributes.background: To allow them 1 other day to celebrate Christmas with loved ones

rejection.details:
Decisions about leave arrangements for NHS staff, including nurses, is a matter for individual NHS emloyers, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petition about relaxing arrangements for household mixing over Christmas, to accommodate workers who will be working on Christmas Day: 

Allow Christmas celebrations on either the 24th, 25th or 26th December: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564244
